source.name: Fungible Tokens: Characteristics and Applications
source.instructions: Which of the following statements accurately describe fungible tokens in blockchain technology? Select all that apply.

answers.answer: Fungible tokens are unique and non-interchangeable digital assets
Each unit of a fungible token has identical value and function within its ecosystem
Fungible tokens are well-suited for use as digital currencies or trading assets
The value of fungible tokens is always stable and doesn't fluctuate
Fungible tokens can be divided into smaller units without losing their value proposition

source.guidance: This question assesses understanding of fungible tokens in blockchain technology. The correct options highlight key characteristics: fungible tokens have identical value and function for each unit, are suitable for use as digital currencies or trading assets, and can be divided into smaller units. The incorrect options address common misconceptions: fungible tokens are not unique or non-interchangeable (that describes non-fungible tokens), and their value can fluctuate based on market conditions. This question encourages critical thinking about the nature and applications of fungible tokens in blockchain ecosystems.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT analyze and evaluate the characteristics and applications of fungible tokens in blockchain ecosystems
